PAUSEICON.path_hint: Folder and filename of where your alternative pause icon is within the Foundry VTT data. Click the picker button to select your icon. Type None, for no image.
PAUSEICON.secondary_path_hint: Folder and filename for a secondary pause icon, which will stay stationary.
PAUSEICON.opacity_hint: Value between 0 and 100, lower means more translucent
PAUSEICON.speed_hint: Seconds per rotation, 0 is no rotation.
PAUSEICON.dimensions_hint: Width and Height of the icon in pixels.
PAUSEICON.positionX_hint: Horizontal position of the Pause Icon on screen, -50 is extreme left, 50 extreme right, works best with gradient off.
PAUSEICON.positionY_hint: Vertical position of the Pause Icon on screen, 0 is extreme top, 100 extreme bottom.
PAUSEICON.fontSize_hint: Size of the font in em, default is 2
PAUSEICON.shadow_hint: When enabled there is a drop shadow under the text.
PAUSEICON.textColor_hint: Either Hexcode (eg. #EEEEEE) or HTML color name (eg. CornflowerBlue)
PAUSEICON.gradient_hint: When enabled show the default gradient under the Pause Icon and Text.
PAUSEICON.pulse_hint: When enabled the Pause Icon and Text slowly pulsate.
PAUSEICON.fontCaps_hint: Sets the capitalization of the Pause Text, default is all uppercase.
PAUSEICON.fontCaps_optionA: Match the given text as it is
PAUSEICON.fontCaps_optionC: Capitalize every first letter of a word
PAUSEICON.fontWeight_hint: Higher weight means a more bold font face. Not all fonts have this option.
PAUSEICON.fontStyle_hint: Style, if available allows the choice between normal or italics.
PAUSEICON.fontName_hint: Name of the font you can choose from, collected from core and system fonts + your own custom fonts
